item.title: Back to Blogging
item.description:
After a long hiatus, I’m starting to blog again.

It’s been over a decade since my last post, and a lot has changed. The world has evolved, technology has leaped forward, and I’ve had countless experiences worth sharing. But some things remain constant â€” the value of writing down your thoughts, sharing knowledge, and connecting with others who are navigating similar challenges.

Event Modeling’s Journey

Since introducing Event Modeling in 2018, I’ve watched it grow from a workshop technique into a global methodology used by teams worldwide. What started as a way to bridge communication between developers and domain experts has become a fundamental approach to designing information systems.
